content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), pipe group at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5) and offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Lab
Consists of lab at position not specified

### Stone brick factory
Consists of furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities into occupied tiles
- Ensure the target tile is empty before attempting to place an entity
- Remove any existing entities at the target position before placing a new entity

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected
- Ensure there are no obstacles blocking the connection
- Ensure the entities have the necessary connection points

### Errors when accessing entity attributes
- Ensure the entity has the attribute being accessed
- Check the entity's documentation for available attributes

### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure the pipe group is properly connected to the fluid system
- Ensure the pipe group has a valid fluid system id

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is properly connected to the fluid system
- Ensure the offshore pump has a valid fluid system id

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine is properly connected to the power network
- Ensure the steam engine has a valid input liquid
- Ensure the steam engine has a valid fluid present in connections
